meanings.definition: The quality or state of being repairable.
meanings.sent1: The repairabilities of the toy made it easy to fix.
meanings.sent2: The repairabilities of the car were impressive, allowing for quick fixes.
meanings.sent3: The repairabilities of the phone were so good that it practically fixed itself!
meanings.sent4: Her repairabilities were like a superhero power, always coming to the rescue.
meanings.sent5: The repairabilities of the machine shone brightly in the workshop.

meanings.sent1: The repairabilities of the computer were limited due to its age.
meanings.sent2: The repairabilities of the house were evident after the storm damage.
meanings.sent3: The repairabilities of the shirt seemed to disappear every time it was washed!
meanings.sent4: His repairabilities were like a safety net, ensuring things could always be fixed.
meanings.sent5: The repairabilities of the bike were put to the test on the rugged terrain.
